ValidationRule.description: Validate Modifier 2 Value based on Modifier 2
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR(AND(ISPICKVAL( Modifer_2__c , 'Text'), NOT(ISBLANK(Modifer_2_Value__c)),OR( NOT( REGEX( Modifer_2_Value__c, "[a-zA-Z0-9]+")) ,ISNUMBER(Modifer_2_Value__c))), AND(ISPICKVAL( Modifer_2__c , 'NUMBER'), NOT(ISBLANK(Modifer_2_Value__c)),OR( NOT( ISNUMBER(Modifer_2_Value__c) ),AND(NOT(REGEX(Modifer_2_Value__c, "[0-9]+[.]{1}{1}[0-9]{2}")),NOT(REGEX(Modifer_2_Value__c, "[0-9]+[.]{1}{1}[0-9]{1}")),NOT(REGEX(Modifer_2_Value__c, "[0-9]+{1}{1}[0-9]{0}")),NOT(REGEX(Modifer_2_Value__c, "-[0-9]+[.]{1}{1}[0-9]{2}")),NOT(REGEX(Modifer_2_Value__c, "-[0-9]+[.]{1}{1}[0-9]{1}")),NOT(REGEX(Modifer_2_Value__c, "-[0-9]+{1}{1}[0-9]{0}")) ))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If Modifier 2 is 'Number', can have only Numbers with 2 decimal point, if Modifier 2 is 'Text', can have Alpha-numeric without special characters
